Please list the MOST COMMONLY GROWN crops in the LGA. List in order of importance. All prices are market prices per kilogram in Naira.

Average crop price in the LGA

Average crop price during lean season
Price of seeds
Price of fertilizer
Price of pesticide
Price of seedlings

Market price per animal
Average price per animal during harvest
Average price per animal during during lean season
Market price of feed per kilogram
Cost of veterinary services per animal
Cost of artificial insemination per animal
Cost of shed
Cost of forrage per kilogram
